Work in progress. View the ppc_dev_testing gist.

Install

See the install guide at the sister-library for SBCs.

Copy into CIRCUITPY/lib: Libraries from CircuitPython Library Bundle:

  1. adafruit_datetime.mpy
  2. adafruit_itertools
  3. adafruit_logging

Library CircuitPython_uschedule:

  1. uschedule.py

Library CircuitPython_pico_pi_controller

  1. CircuitPython_pico_pi_controller
